name: PowerPlatformGetConnectionString
friendlyName: Power Platform Get Environment Connection String
description: Power Platform Get Environment Connection String
author: Remy Blok

inputs.name: authenticationType
inputs.label: Authentication type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authentication via username/password is simpler to set up but won't work if your AAD tenant requires MFA; use Service Principal Name (SPN) if MFA is required.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformEnvironment
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with username/password. Does not support MFA.

inputs.name: PowerPlatformSPN
inputs.label: Service connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Authenticate with your Power Platform environment with an Azure AppID, tenantID and client secret.

inputs.name: OutputVariableName
inputs.label: Output Variable Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the pipeline variable to set with the connection string value.

inputs.name: AppId
inputs.label: App Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: App Id to use to login. Uses a default value when no App Id is specified

inputs.name: RedirectUri
inputs.label: Redirect Uri
inputs.helpMarkDown: Redirect URI of the specificed App. Needed when specifying an App Id
